Paragraph.Text: Is eligible to be held in book-entry form on the books of the Federal Reserve Book-Entry System; or
Is eligible for deposit in a depository trust clearing system established to hold and transfer securities by computerized book-entry systems; and which
Is held in the name of the Chief Financial Officer, in the name of the State Treasurer, or in the name of the State Insurance Commissioner; or
Is pledged to the Chief Financial Officer, to the State Treasurer, or to the State Insurance Commissioner;

SectionBody.Text: under any state law for any purpose whatsoever, may be held in book-entry form on the books of the Federal Reserve Book-Entry System or on deposit in a depository trust clearing system.
